<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This file implements the newly proposed standard C++ interfaces for hashing</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// arbitrary data and building hash functions for user-defined types. This</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// interface was originally proposed in N3333&#91;1&#93; and is currently under review</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// for inclusion in a future TR and/or standard.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The primary interfaces provide are comprised of one type and three functions:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  -- &#39;hash&#95;code&#39; class is an opaque type representing the hash code for some</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     data. It is the intended product of hashing, and can be used to implement</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     hash tables, checksumming, and other common uses of hashes. It is not an</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     integer type (although it can be converted to one) because it is risky</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     to assume much about the internals of a hash&#95;code. In particular, each</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     execution of the program has a high probability of producing a different</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     hash&#95;code for a given input. Thus their values are not stable to save or</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     persist, and should only be used during the execution for the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     construction of hashing datastructures.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  -- &#39;hash&#95;value&#39; is a function designed to be overloaded for each</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     user-defined type which wishes to be used within a hashing context. It</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     should be overloaded within the user-defined type&#39;s namespace and found</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     via ADL. Overloads for primitive types are provided by this library.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  -- &#39;hash&#95;combine&#39; and &#39;hash&#95;combine&#95;range&#39; are functions designed to aid</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      programmers in easily and intuitively combining a set of data into</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      a single hash&#95;code for their object. They should only logically be used</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      within the implementation of a &#39;hash&#95;value&#39; routine or similar context.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note that &#39;hash&#95;combine&#95;range&#39; contains very special logic for hashing</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a contiguous array of integers or pointers. This logic is &#42;extremely&#42; fast,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// on a modern Intel &quot;Gainestown&quot; Xeon (Nehalem uarch) @2.2 GHz, these were</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// benchmarked at over 6.5 GiB/s for large keys, and &lt;20 cycles/hash for keys</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// under 32-bytes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="comment">/// An opaque object representing a hash code.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This object represents the result of hashing some entity. It is intended to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="comment">/// be used to implement hashtables or other hashing-based data structures.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">/// While it wraps and exposes a numeric value, this value should not be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="comment">/// trusted to be stable or predictable across processes or executions.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="comment">/// In order to obtain the hash&#95;code for an object &#39;x&#39;:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">///   using llvm::hash&#95;value;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="comment">///   llvm::hash&#95;code code = hash&#95;value(x);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\endcode</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hash-code"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hash-code/#abd6f4d7040c2f68979f42c9494c0e338">hash&#95;code</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Compute a hash&#95;code for any integer value.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Note that this function is intended to compute the same hash&#95;code for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="comment">/// a particular value without regard to the pre-promotion type. This is in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="comment">/// contrast to hash&#95;combine which may produce different hash&#95;codes for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="comment">/// differing argument types even if they would implicit promote to a common</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="comment">/// type without changing the value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> T&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">std::enable&#95;if&#95;t&lt;is&#95;integral&#95;or&#95;enum&lt;T&gt;::value, hash&#95;code&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e2e479cf4860dc8a00614e36ee3d5e9">hash&#95;value</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> value);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Compute a hash&#95;code for a pointer&#39;s address.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="comment">/// N.B.: This hashes the &#42;address&#42;. Not the value and not the type.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> T&gt; hash&#95;code <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e2e479cf4860dc8a00614e36ee3d5e9">hash&#95;value</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &#42;ptr);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Compute a hash&#95;code for a pair of objects.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> T, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> U&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">hash&#95;code <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e2e479cf4860dc8a00614e36ee3d5e9">hash&#95;value</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::pair&lt;T, U&gt; &amp;arg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Compute a hash&#95;code for a tuple.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">... Ts&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal">hash&#95;code <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e2e479cf4860dc8a00614e36ee3d5e9">hash&#95;value</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::tuple&lt;Ts...&gt; &amp;arg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Compute a hash&#95;code for a standard string.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> T&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">hash&#95;code <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e2e479cf4860dc8a00614e36ee3d5e9">hash&#95;value</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::basic&#95;string&lt;T&gt; &amp;arg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Compute a hash&#95;code for a standard string.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> T&gt; hash&#95;code <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e2e479cf4860dc8a00614e36ee3d5e9">hash&#95;value</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::optional&lt;T&gt; &amp;arg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// All of the implementation details of actually computing the various hash</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// code values are held within this namespace. These routines are included in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the header file mainly to allow inlining and constant propagation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing">hashing</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/detail">detail</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;p) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t result;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">  memcpy(&amp;result, p, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(result));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#ab9f705441a3a825d4b8a93ca4476d4e7">sys::IsBigEndianHost</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#ad0e418047a3e04c4fd1fb83325b571ae">sys::swapByteOrder</a>(result);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> result;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a8b7aec03f89d9512ce1a14a3308ca161"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a8b7aec03f89d9512ce1a14a3308ca161">fetch32</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;p) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t result;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">  memcpy(&amp;result, p, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(result));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#ab9f705441a3a825d4b8a93ca4476d4e7">sys::IsBigEndianHost</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#ad0e418047a3e04c4fd1fb83325b571ae">sys::swapByteOrder</a>(result);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> result;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Some primes between 2^63 and 2^64 for various uses.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#aa14801ceabdb9a21f12353bb2157bd9f"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#aa14801ceabdb9a21f12353bb2157bd9f">k0</a> = 0xc3a5c85c97cb3127ULL;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a8024b8ff1557e1fb8d1c607b1420de02"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a8024b8ff1557e1fb8d1c607b1420de02">k1</a> = 0xb492b66fbe98f273ULL;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a56c87fc8a8726f0caf29ef182189d3b3"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a56c87fc8a8726f0caf29ef182189d3b3">k2</a> = 0x9ae16a3b2f90404fULL;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a955d5d8e5c62042ded7184cc9e0516de"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a955d5d8e5c62042ded7184cc9e0516de">k3</a> = 0xc949d7c7509e6557ULL;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Bitwise right rotate.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Normally this will compile to a single instruction, especially if the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="comment">/// shift is a manifest constant.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a4ffb910d18d978660569ea44ac87e494"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a4ffb910d18d978660569ea44ac87e494">rotate</a>(uint64&#95;t val, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> shift) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Avoid shifting by 64: doing so yields an undefined result.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> shift == 0 ? val : ((val &gt;&gt; shift) | (val &lt;&lt; (64 - shift)));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#aaebf1b7abefd58ee53874924675a8884"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#aaebf1b7abefd58ee53874924675a8884">shift&#95;mix</a>(uint64&#95;t val) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> val ^ (val &gt;&gt; 47);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#ad83862adf1fbf2399e28c062421d6a9b"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#ad83862adf1fbf2399e28c062421d6a9b">hash&#95;16&#95;bytes</a>(uint64&#95;t low, uint64&#95;t high) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Murmur-inspired hashing.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t kMul = 0x9ddfea08eb382d69ULL;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t a = (low ^ high) &#42; kMul;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">  a ^= (a &gt;&gt; 47);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t b = (high ^ a) &#42; kMul;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">  b ^= (b &gt;&gt; 47);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">  b &#42;= kMul;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> b;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a04c178b7e1b96b98934763374a4485d9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a04c178b7e1b96b98934763374a4485d9">hash&#95;1to3&#95;bytes</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;s, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> len, uint64&#95;t seed) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint8&#95;t a = s&#91;0&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint8&#95;t b = s&#91;len &gt;&gt; 1&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint8&#95;t c = s&#91;len - 1&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t y = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">uint32&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(a) + (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">uint32&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(b) &lt;&lt; 8);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t z = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">uint32&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(len) + (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">uint32&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(c) &lt;&lt; 2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#aaebf1b7abefd58ee53874924675a8884">shift&#95;mix</a>(y &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a56c87fc8a8726f0caf29ef182189d3b3">k2</a> ^ z &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a955d5d8e5c62042ded7184cc9e0516de">k3</a> ^ seed) &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a56c87fc8a8726f0caf29ef182189d3b3">k2</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a47f5fadf2eb86ee5088924d5760dae3f"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a47f5fadf2eb86ee5088924d5760dae3f">hash&#95;4to8&#95;bytes</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;s, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> len, uint64&#95;t seed) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t a = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a8b7aec03f89d9512ce1a14a3308ca161">fetch32</a>(s);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#ad83862adf1fbf2399e28c062421d6a9b">hash&#95;16&#95;bytes</a>(len + (a &lt;&lt; 3), seed ^ <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a8b7aec03f89d9512ce1a14a3308ca161">fetch32</a>(s + len - 4));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a17851b50e69ca9482ea8fb104ae202b3"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a17851b50e69ca9482ea8fb104ae202b3">hash&#95;9to16&#95;bytes</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;s, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> len, uint64&#95;t seed) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t a = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t b = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + len - 8);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#ad83862adf1fbf2399e28c062421d6a9b">hash&#95;16&#95;bytes</a>(seed ^ a, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a4ffb910d18d978660569ea44ac87e494">rotate</a>(b + len, len)) ^ b;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6fd531b33128989cc9e90c8e08b876d3"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6fd531b33128989cc9e90c8e08b876d3">hash&#95;17to32&#95;bytes</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;s, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> len, uint64&#95;t seed) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t a = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s) &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a8024b8ff1557e1fb8d1c607b1420de02">k1</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t b = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + 8);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t c = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + len - 8) &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a56c87fc8a8726f0caf29ef182189d3b3">k2</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t d = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + len - 16) &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#aa14801ceabdb9a21f12353bb2157bd9f">k0</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#ad83862adf1fbf2399e28c062421d6a9b">hash&#95;16&#95;bytes</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(a - b, 43) +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="normal">                           <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(c ^ seed, 30) + d,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal">                       a + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(b ^ <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a955d5d8e5c62042ded7184cc9e0516de">k3</a>, 20) - c + len + seed);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#ab41bb88af8fda8fa4eaa0f41ccc98042"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#ab41bb88af8fda8fa4eaa0f41ccc98042">hash&#95;33to64&#95;bytes</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;s, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> len, uint64&#95;t seed) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t z = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + 24);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t a = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s) + (len + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + len - 16)) &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#aa14801ceabdb9a21f12353bb2157bd9f">k0</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t b = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(a + z, 52);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t c = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(a, 37);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal">  a += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + 8);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="normal">  c += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(a, 7);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="normal">  a += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + 16);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t vf = a + z;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t vs = b + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(a, 31) + c;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="normal">  a = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + 16) + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + len - 32);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="normal">  z = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + len - 8);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="normal">  b = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(a + z, 52);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal">  c = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(a, 37);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="normal">  a += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + len - 24);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="normal">  c += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(a, 7);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="normal">  a += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + len - 16);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t wf = a + z;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t ws = b + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(a, 31) + c;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t r = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#aaebf1b7abefd58ee53874924675a8884">shift&#95;mix</a>((vf + ws) &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a56c87fc8a8726f0caf29ef182189d3b3">k2</a> + (wf + vs) &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#aa14801ceabdb9a21f12353bb2157bd9f">k0</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#aaebf1b7abefd58ee53874924675a8884">shift&#95;mix</a>((seed ^ (r &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#aa14801ceabdb9a21f12353bb2157bd9f">k0</a>)) + vs) &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a56c87fc8a8726f0caf29ef182189d3b3">k2</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a9f8d3250fbca36e49b9c1304f31bdfb8"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a9f8d3250fbca36e49b9c1304f31bdfb8">hash&#95;short</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;s, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> length, uint64&#95;t seed) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (length &gt;= 4 &amp;&amp; length &lt;= 8)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a47f5fadf2eb86ee5088924d5760dae3f">hash&#95;4to8&#95;bytes</a>(s, length, seed);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (length &gt; 8 &amp;&amp; length &lt;= 16)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a17851b50e69ca9482ea8fb104ae202b3">hash&#95;9to16&#95;bytes</a>(s, length, seed);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (length &gt; 16 &amp;&amp; length &lt;= 32)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6fd531b33128989cc9e90c8e08b876d3">hash&#95;17to32&#95;bytes</a>(s, length, seed);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (length &gt; 32)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#ab41bb88af8fda8fa4eaa0f41ccc98042">hash&#95;33to64&#95;bytes</a>(s, length, seed);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (length != 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a04c178b7e1b96b98934763374a4485d9">hash&#95;1to3&#95;bytes</a>(s, length, seed);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a56c87fc8a8726f0caf29ef182189d3b3">k2</a> ^ seed;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The intermediate state used during hashing.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Currently, the algorithm for computing hash codes is based on CityHash and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="comment">/// keeps 56 bytes of arbitrary state.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state">hash&#95;state</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#afd7bc94b3368f293d73243e0c2252199"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#afd7bc94b3368f293d73243e0c2252199">h0</a> = 0, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#a066e9765c5bc2a3e6240cea24123e89a">h1</a> = 0, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#ac3fb731f4a7cf1257cc129b1d3119b71">h2</a> = 0, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#a472772dcef33b525c2f458ce5ed37554">h3</a> = 0, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#afae92e6488bf8e65c72f1d96ad9edb8c">h4</a> = 0, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#a92a5fa1b3b425299ac1ce8d7daff0b27">h5</a> = 0, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#adeeb0bb9c8445a9f89e46c8af40553fe">h6</a> = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Create a new hash&#95;state structure and initialize it based on the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// seed and the first 64-byte chunk.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This effectively performs the initial mix.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#a304239d286ddae5c8c7c04974964e1e4"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state">hash&#95;state</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#a304239d286ddae5c8c7c04974964e1e4">create</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;s, uint64&#95;t seed) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state">hash&#95;state</a> state = &#123;0,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="normal">                        seed,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="normal">                        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#ad83862adf1fbf2399e28c062421d6a9b">hash&#95;16&#95;bytes</a>(seed, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a8024b8ff1557e1fb8d1c607b1420de02">k1</a>),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="normal">                        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(seed ^ <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a8024b8ff1557e1fb8d1c607b1420de02">k1</a>, 49),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="normal">                        seed &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a8024b8ff1557e1fb8d1c607b1420de02">k1</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="normal">                        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#aaebf1b7abefd58ee53874924675a8884">shift&#95;mix</a>(seed),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="normal">                        0&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><Highlight kind="normal">    state.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#adeeb0bb9c8445a9f89e46c8af40553fe">h6</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#ad83862adf1fbf2399e28c062421d6a9b">hash&#95;16&#95;bytes</a>(state.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#afae92e6488bf8e65c72f1d96ad9edb8c">h4</a>, state.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#a92a5fa1b3b425299ac1ce8d7daff0b27">h5</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><Highlight kind="normal">    state.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#ab7b8ef7c970f0050e15688a0a3241fde">mix</a>(s);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> state;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Mix 32-bytes from the input sequence into the 16-bytes of &#39;a&#39;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// and &#39;b&#39;, including whatever is already in &#39;a&#39; and &#39;b&#39;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#a6e2b4cb1c01e3fd1504a02bd613677fd"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#a6e2b4cb1c01e3fd1504a02bd613677fd">mix&#95;32&#95;bytes</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;s, uint64&#95;t &amp;a, uint64&#95;t &amp;b) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><Highlight kind="normal">    a += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t c = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + 24);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><Highlight kind="normal">    b = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(b + a + c, 21);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t d = a;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><Highlight kind="normal">    a += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + 8) + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + 16);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><Highlight kind="normal">    b += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(a, 44) + d;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><Highlight kind="normal">    a += c;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Mix in a 64-byte buffer of data.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// We mix all 64 bytes even when the chunk length is smaller, but we</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// record the actual length.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#ab7b8ef7c970f0050e15688a0a3241fde"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#ab7b8ef7c970f0050e15688a0a3241fde">mix</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;s) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
